SA10n1082:1: sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ sarvatra na vidyate svabhāvaścet |
SA10n1082:3: atha sasvabhāvametadvākyaṃ śrutvā hatā pratijñā te |
SA10n1082:8: evaṃ tava pratijñā lakṣaṇato duṣyate na mama ||4 ||
SA10n1082:9: pratyakṣeṇa hi tāvan yadyupalabhya vinivartayasi bhāvān |
SA10n1082:17: yadi ca na bhavet svabhāvo dharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāva ityevam |
SA10n1082:19: atha vidyate svabhāvaḥ sa ca dharmāṇāṃ na vidyate tasmāt |
SA10n1082:20: dharmairvinā svabhāvaḥ sa yasyāsti tad yuktamupadeṣṭum ||10 ||
SA10n1082:21: sata eva pratiṣedho nāsti ghaṭo geha ityayaṃ yasmāt |
SA10n1082:22: dṛṣṭaḥ pratiṣedho'yaṃ sataḥ svabhāvasya te tasmāt ||11 ||
SA10n1082:23: atha nāsti sa svabhāvaḥ kiṃ nu pratividhyate tvayānena |
SA10n1082:27: nanvevaṃ satyasti grāho grāhyaṃ ca tagdṛhītaṃ ca |
SA10n1082:28: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣeddhā ceti ṣaṭkaṃ tat ||14 ||
SA10n1082:29: atha naivāsti grāho na ca grāhyaṃ na ca grahītāraḥ |
SA10n1082:30: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣeddhāro'sya tu na santi ||15 ||
SA10n1082:31: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣeddhāraśca yadyuta na santi |
SA10n1082:33: hetostato na siddhirnaiḥsvābhāvyāt kuto hi te hetuḥ |
SA10n1082:35: yadi cāhetoḥ siddhiḥ svabhāvavinivartanasya te bhavati |
SA10n1082:38: loke naiḥsvābhāvyānna hi kaścana vidyate bhāvaḥ ||19 ||
SA10n1082:39: pūrvaṃ cet pratiṣedhaḥ paścāt pratiṣedhyamiti ca nopapannam |
SA10n1082:43: yaśca pratītya bhāvo bhāvānāṃ śūnyateti sā hyuktā |
SA10n1082:44: yaśca pratītya bhāvo bhavati hi tasyāsvabhāvatvam ||22 ||
SA10n1082:48: nāsti ca vaiṣamikatvaṃ viśeṣahetuśca na nigadyaḥ ||24 ||
SA10n1082:49: mā śabdavaditi nāyaṃ dṛṣṭānto yastvayā mamārabdhaḥ |
SA10n1082:50: śabdena hi tacca śabdasya vāraṇaṃ naiva me vacaḥ ||25 ||
SA10n1082:55: athavā sādhyasamo'yaṃ heturna hi vidyate dhvaneḥ sattā |
SA10n1082:57: yadi kācana pratijñā tatra syādeṣa me bhaveddoṣaḥ |
SA10n1082:58: nāsti ca mama pratijñā tasmānnaivāsti me doṣaḥ ||29 ||
SA10n1082:62: teṣāṃ punaḥ prasiddhiṃ brūhi kathaṃ te pramāṇānām ||31 ||
SA10n1082:73: nāsti tamaśca jvalane yatra ca tiṣṭhati sadātmani jvalanaḥ |
SA10n1082:74: kurute kathaṃ prakāśaṃ sa hi prakāśo'ndhakāravadhaḥ ||38 ||
SA10n1082:76: utpadyamāna eva prāpnoti tamo na hi hutāśaḥ ||39 ||
SA10n1082:81: anapekṣya hi prameyānarthān yadi te pramāṇasiddhiḥ |
SA10n1082:85: sidhyanti hi prameyāṇyapekṣya yadi sarvathā pramāṇāni |
SA10n1082:88: kiṃ te pramāṇasiddhyā tāni yadarthaṃ prasiddhaṃ tat ||45 ||
SA10n1082:90: vyatyaya evaṃ sati te dhruvaṃ pramāṇaprameyāṇām ||46 ||
SA10n1082:91: atha tai pramāṇasiddhyā prameyasiddhiḥ prameyasiddhyā cā
SA10n1082:93: sidhyanti hi pramāṇairyadi prameyāṇi tāni taireva |
SA10n1082:95: sidhyanti ca prameyairyadi pramāṇāni tāni taireva |
SA10n1082:97: pitrā yadyutpādyaḥ putro yadi tena caiva putreṇa |
SA10n1082:98: utpādyaḥ sa yadi pitā vada tatrotpādayati kaḥ kam ||50 ||
SA10n1082:99: kaśca pitā kaḥ putrastatra tvaṃ brūhi tāvubhāvapi ca |
SA10n1082:102: bhavati na ca prameyairna cāpyakasmāt pramāṇānām ||52 ||
SA10n1082:105: yadi ca pratītya kuśalaḥ svabhāva utpadyate sa kuśalānām |
SA10n1082:106: dharmāṇāṃ parabhāvaḥ svabhāva evaṃ kathaṃ bhavati ||54 ||
SA10n1082:107: atha na pratītya kiṃcit svabhāva utpadyate sa kuśalānām |
SA10n1082:109: nādharmo dharmo vā saṃvyavahārāśca laukikā na syuḥ |
SA10n1082:113: yaḥ sadbhūtaṃ nāma brūyāt sa svabhāva ityevam |
SA10n1082:114: bhavatā prativaktavyo nāma brūmaśca na vyaṃ sat ||58 ||
SA10n1082:115: nāmāsaditi ca yadidaṃ tatkiṃ nu sato bhavatyutāsataḥ |
SA10n1082:116: yadi hi sato yadyasato dvidhāpi te hīyate vādaḥ ||59 ||
SA10n1082:119: atha vidyate svabhāvaḥ sa ca dharmāṇāṃ na vidyata iti |
SA10n1082:121: sata eva pratiṣedho yadi śūnyatvaṃ nanvapratiṣiddhamidam |
SA10n1082:123: pratiṣedhayase'tha tvaṃ śūnyatvaṃ tacca nāsti śūnyatvam |
SA10n1082:124: pratiṣedhaḥ sata iti te nanvevaṃ hīyate vādaḥ ||63 ||
SA10n1082:125: pratiṣedhayāmi nāhaṃ kiṃcit pratiṣedhyamasti na ca kiṃcit |
SA10n1082:130: tatrāpi nirṇayaṃ śṛṇu yathā sa dṛṣṭānta upapannaḥ ||66 ||
SA10n1082:131: sa yadi svabhāvataḥ syāt bhāvo na syāt pratītyasamudbhūtaḥ |
SA10n1082:132: yaśca pratītya bhavati grāho nanu śūnyatā saiva ||67 ||
SA10n1082:133: yadi ca svabhāvataḥ syād grāhaḥ kastaṃ nivartayed grāhyam |
SA10n1082:135: etena hetvabhāvaḥ pratyuktaḥ pūrvameva sa samatvāt |
SA10n1082:137: yastraikālye hetuḥ pratyuktaḥ pūrvameva sa samatvāt |
SA10n1082:139: prabhavati ca śūnyateyaṃ yasya prabhavanti tasya sarvārthāḥ |
SA10n1082:140: prabhavati na tasya kiṃ na bhavati śūnyatā yasyeti ||71 ||
